verbose_text: The dual role of KOR is reminiscent of MOR1 and 5HT1A, which is predominantly implicated in anti-nociceptive signaling, with only a small percentage communicating with GRPR, in contrast to KOR-GRPR, to induce or facilitate itch.
evidence: KOR is reminiscent of MOR1 and 5HT1A, which is predominantly implicated in anti-nociceptive signaling, with only a small percentage communicating with GRPR, in contrast to KOR-GRPR, to induce or facilitate itch
